title: Promote your business, website or app
sub_title: Take a chance to reach our users with your product
message:
If you have a small business or a website or even a published application (related to technology) & you are trying to promote these as usual, you can take a chance to spread your works to the user of AIDE Assistant with low cost.

You may be known to the banner ads shown in the bottom part of the display throughout the application. If you want to take a chance to link your business, website or application with this type of ad, you can contact us.

Email: naimur.mine@gmail.com
